text: Ajarchu kei'n khawa mun kahongtung phakhan kei'n nangni angme kinamin ezoot, halli nangni'n kei angme ningnamin ezoot kha eleiya, inteiya inleiminrilla kichi eii. Khawa khachu, insuol, kara-ot, araang kase, esik karatok, injakna khat-um mi chongkaril, in-or halli chongsuok raalsuok kei'n mucha tia kamalung adong.
